title: Are there any discounts for Certification Courseware materials and Exam?

sections.title: Symptoms
content:
• I am interested in purchasing Unity Certification Courseware and taking the Exam.
  • I wish to know if I qualify for any discounts to the purchase price.

sections.title: Cause
content: Unity often have discounted deals available, and the same is true for our Certification Courseware and Exam prices.

sections.title: Resolution
content: Once Courseware and Exams are available for purchase, this will be handled through our Website for individual Developers and through our Sales Team for Educational and Studio users.
Studios or commercial organizations wishing to offer Unity Certification to a group may qualify for discounted pricing. Please speak to Sales for more information.

Educational institutions who wish to offer Unity Certification to their students may be eligible for discounted pricing. Please speak to the Sales Representative for your region. We do not offer a student discount for Certification.

sections.title: More Information
content: For general information about pricing, please see this article.
